items.question: What is FlowStudio?
items.answer: FlowStudio is an AI-powered image generation platform. Create professional product photos, SNS promotional materials, and detail pages in just 30 seconds with text descriptions. No Photoshop or design skills required.

items.question: How do I generate images?
items.answer: Simply describe the image you want in text, or upload a reference image. The AI will automatically generate 4 images. Choose the ones you like to save or continue editing.

items.question: How are credits used?
items.answer: Image generation costs 20 credits, and 4K upscaling costs 10 credits. New users receive free credits upon signup, and you can purchase more on the credits page. Refer friends to earn bonus credits.

items.question: What resolution are the generated images?
items.answer: Images are generated at 2K (2048px) resolution by default. For higher quality, use the 4K (4096px) upscale feature. This quality is sufficient for commercial printing.

items.question: Who owns the copyright to generated images?
items.answer: Copyright belongs to you, the user. You can freely use generated images for commercial purposes (e-commerce, advertising, SNS, etc.). Note that AI-generated image laws vary by country, so please verify when using internationally.

items.question: How can I get a refund?
items.answer: Unused credits are eligible for refund. Please contact customer service within 7 days of purchase. See the refund policy at the bottom of the page for details.
